resources.string:
• More variables can be final
• Update Butter Knife library
• Update Android Support Library
• Add checking runtime to Device Info
• Make hasTemp() return false if file length is 0
• Update to latest gradle and android build tools
• Add service to check if device is entering deep sleep
• Catch ActivityNotFoundException if unable to open links
If you are using an AdBlocker please whitelist crashlytics.com in order for crash and usage reporting to work properly.\n
